source.sqlReaderQuery: select LastRunTime-100 LastModifiedDateTime from LastRunTimeStmp WHERE SourceName = 'SAP-L22'

expression.value:
@or(
equals(
item().name, 
concat('SAP_L22_ZPInfo_', substring(item().name, sub(length(item().name), 18), 10), '.csv.zip')), 
equals(
item().name, 
concat('SAP_L22_ZPInfo_meldekz_', substring(item().name, sub(length(item().name), 18), 10), '.csv.zip'))
)

@or(
equals(
item().name, 
concat('SAP_L22_ZPInfo_', addhours(utcnow(), -0, 'yyyy') , '-' , addhours(utcnow(), -0, 'MM'), '.csv.gz')), 
equals(
item().name, 
concat('SAP_L22_ZPInfo_', addhours(utcnow(), -0, 'yyyy') , '-' ,adddays(utcnow(),  mul(int(addhours(utcnow(), -0, 'dd')),-1), 'MM'), '.csv.gz'))
)

source.sqlReaderQuery: select LastRunTime-100 LastModifiedDateTime from LastRunTimeStmp WHERE SourceName = 'SAP-L22'
select LastRunTime LastModifiedDateTime from LastRunTimeStmp WHERE SourceName = 'SAP-L22'
select LastRunTime-10 LastModifiedDateTime from LastRunTimeStmp WHERE SourceName = 'SAP-L22'

expression.value:
@or(
equals(
item().name, 
concat('SAP_L22_ZPInfo_', substring(item().name, sub(length(item().name), 18), 10), '.csv.zip')), 
equals(
item().name, 
concat('SAP_L22_ZPInfo_meldekz_', substring(item().name, sub(length(item().name), 18), 10), '.csv.zip'))
)
